name: Jumbotron - Fluid
heading: jumbotron-fluid
description: Lightweight, flexible component for showcasing hero unit style content.
usage: To make the jumbotron full width, and without rounded corners, add the .jumbotron-fluid modifier class and add a .container or .container-fluid within.
snippet:
"

Fluid jumbotron

This is a modified jumbotron that occupies the entire horizontal space of its parent.

"
